Description:
Right Where You Want To Be
Situated in a highly sought after residential pocket is this family home representing a super buy for owner occupiers and investors alike. Comprising of 4 bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe and a good sized ensuite, fully tiled open plan living and dining area and well appointed hostess kitchen. Features include; ducted heating, cooling, double lock up garage with drive through access and a large 595 m2 approx and large backyard. Close proximity to local schools, shops, transport and parkland as well as easy freeway access.
For further details, please contact:
Minh Tran 0434 223 998
Quyen Tran 0478 660 838
Peter Dang 0433 493 257

Description:
A Solid Investment
Perfectly presented with a popular floor plan to match, this is an investment opportunity you don’t want to pass up, being sold with a lease at $1,257 per month until August 2017, the stressful part has been done. Situated in a quiet pocket of Derrimut and within close proximity to Derrimut Village, public transport, Deer Park train station, Sunshine golf club, parks, sporting facilities and easy freeway access.
Comprising of 2 spacious bedrooms with BIR, Master bedroom with full ensuite and WIR, bright central bathroom with toilet, modern kitchen fitted with stainless steel appliances, overlooking the meals area and adjoining lounge room, large home office with BIR’s (potential 3rd bedroom), ample storage space, very low maintenance garden with potential side access and a double remote garage with rear access.
Features: Ducted heating, dishwasher, under bench oven, gas cook top, range hood, alarm and french doors.
Insights: 7 Chiswick Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Derrimut's Best Kept Secret Unveiled
Set on a generous size 648sm (approx) block, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations.
This home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 4 lavish bedrooms, 3 stunning bathrooms as well as a generous ensemble of living rooms.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with soaring high ceilings. The property also comprises a generous study room/5th bedroom, dining area, casual living room. The gourmet kitchen includes top quality stainless steel appliances, walk in pantry and glass splashback.
Upstairs features a second decadent master suite complete with your own retreat and ensuite which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
It is also ideal for a variety of other uses, anything from running an online business to a large theatre or recreation room.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises of a massive alfresco area with cafe blinds. A second separate outdoor entertaining area includes a fireplace and built in spa.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 2 cars with drive through access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar power, and established landscaping contribute to this fine property.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Cameron Vurovecz : 0431 945 737

This is an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Perfect Home In The Perfect Location!!!
This spacious house in Brimbank Gardens Estate 27Sqs (Apporx) on a 504 m2 (Apporx) land is beautifully presented and a guarantee to impress any seasoned entertainer! Tasteful colour schemes and wonderful attention to details.
The three spacious bedrooms are carpeted and the master has an enormous walk in robe and modern ensuite. The remaining two share access to the master bathroom, and have spacious built in robes. All bedrooms are equipped with ceiling fans, plus there is ducted heating throughout the home. The living space is generous, with a free form open plan design.
The area is tiled for easy maintenance, and a separate lounge room is carpeted. The kitchen has all of the features you seek including a stainless steel gas oven, dishwasher and ample cupboard space. There is a remote double lock up garage, and the back yard is large and fully fenced, with a paved entertainment patio area. The house is situated on a quiet street, with easy access to local parks, shops, transport and schools.
This opportunity that gives you the home you want at an affordable price is not to be missed!!
This beauty comprises of:
*Master bedroom with Ensuite and WIR.
*2 Bedrooms with BIR'S.
*Two Living area
*Dishwasher
*Open plan kitchen adjoining family Meals area.
*Separate bathroom, toilet and laundry area.
*Garage with internal access.
*Fully Landscaped Backyard
Call Sachin 0433 110 100 or Melanie on 0410 811 100 to arrange an inspection as this one won't last long.
Photo ID is a must for all inspections.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
With great street appeal, bonus side access to the rear and a flexible floorplan allowing the home to be easily converted into a 4 bedroom plus study home accommodating any buyers particular requirements, this lovely Porter Davis residence promises to be popular. The property currently comprises 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, the master with WIR and double vanity ensuite with oversize shower. The contemporary open plan design features step up kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooking the large dining and living space which leads out to the lovely alfresco area and beautiful gardens creating a great indoor/outdoor entertainment zone. Other features include separate study (easy 4th bedroom conversion), second living or rumpus room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, quality window furnishings, landscaped low maintenance front and rear gardens including extensive artificial grass, double remote garage with internal access and extra oversized driveway and side access to the rear providing off street parking for a multitude of vehicles, your boat or caravan. All this on a large allotment of approximately 540sqm in an enviable location right in the heart of Derrimut.
Insights: 11 Inverness Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
With the Derrimut Village and Deer Park train station a short stroll up the road, bus stop at your doorstep and schools, parkland and golf course a similar distance down the road, this lovely family residence provides a lifestyle of total convenience. An open plan kitchen with stone benches, glass splashback, 900mm appliances and huge walk in pantry overlooks the expansive dining and main living area that spills out to the magnificent decked outdoor entertainment zone with huge pitch roof pergola. Sleeping quarters currently comprise 3 spacious bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite whilst the other bedrooms are serviced by a lovely central bathroom. Completing the home are 2 other principal rooms currently being used as a lounge and open study of which either can be easily closed off and converted into a 4th bedroom or theatre room suiting any buyers particular requirements. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, additional split system in living room, solar panel system, alarm, landscaped front and rear gardens, double remote garage with internal and rear roller door access and double driveway accommodating off street parking for several vehicles. With everything already done for you, the lucky purchaser can move straight in and enjoy a stress free lifestyle in a fantastic location.
Insights: 54 Hammerwood Avenue, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Lucky number 8
Beautifully presented on a great size corner allotment of approx. 625 sqm in the heart of Derrimut, you're guaranteed to fall head over heels for this amazing home that impresses in so many ways.
This Stunning residence provides a generous floor plan of grand proportions hosting four large bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, 2 massive living areas adjoining the open plan kitchen and meals area.
The central kitchen features large bench space, stainless steel appliances with impressive storage within the walk in pantry. Providing the perfect entertaining lifestyle the large living room opens onto the huge backyard with potential to create your own oasis (pool/ separate garage/ entertaining area). Enhanced with beautiful flooring, large separate laundry, central bathroom with spa bathtub, gas ducted heating, evaporative
cooling, central vacuum, double car garage with drive through access and abundant storage, it's every bit the complete family home.
With the large corner block this property also offers great potential for side access perfect for those who have a caravan, boat or trailer or even a second dwelling (STCA).
As the future occupant, you'll also be treated to five-star convenience with schools, child care and sports facilities just meters away and the Western Ring Road ,
Call us today to arrange for your inspection.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 38 Upton Circle Derrimut, a property that will quite simply just blow you away. Raising the bar in luxury living and offering the ultimate lifestyle this home is highlighted by the most magnificent outdoor entertainment area that easily closes off from the outside, a soundproof theatre room that can also be used as a formal lounge or 4th bedroom and a first class interior with upgrades and extras at every turn. Masterfully designed the magnificent kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback and 900mm appliances overlooks the dining , main living and outdoor entertainment area forming a huge indoor / outdoor zone when entertaining with discreet sleeping quarters comprising 3 spacious bedrooms with BIRs , master with WIR and ensuite. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, feature fireplace and additional cooling system in the theatre room, WIFI controlled designer lighting, range hood and gas line for BBQ, sprinkler system to the gorgeous front and rear gardens, video doorbell, security cameras, double remote garage with internal access and double driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles. Completing this package is a prime location with all amenities literally a few steps away.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
An Abundance of Space- Where Size Matters
A breathtaking residence located in the beautiful Derrimut Estate within short distance to schools, shops, parks, transport and the Sunshine golf course
this family home is set on an impressive allotment of Approx 852m2. Sure to leave a long lasting impression, this brilliantly built; perfectly positioned home has everything you're looking for.
At first glance the home will take your breath away with its lush open floor plan, generous living areas and double door entry. Make your way into the hub of the home where you will find a formal lounge room, a spacious kitchen boasting modern stainless steel appliances that will allow you plenty of room to cook for friends & family all the while overlooking the dining and family rooms. The alfresco area will make entertaining all year round a breeze. This family home offers 4 large bedrooms plus study, Master with in walk robe and ensuite that provides an oversized shower and spa. The other three bedrooms all have built in robes serviced by the sparkling central bathroom which will cater for little ones. The study also could be converted into a 5th bedroom.
Features include ducted heating, split system cooling heating, floating floors, security alarm system, crim safe security doors, high ceilings, and a double remote control garage with internal access. The property also has side access to cater for the boat or trailer.
This home is sure to tick all your boxes so be sure to inspect soon.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
An enormous allotment (approx 640sqm), prime location and fantastic spaces all combine to present you with this gorgeous Urben Edge residence . Wonderfully designed the huge central kitchen featuring glass splash back, walk in pantry and 900mm stainless steel appliances overlooks the rumpus, main living and dining area. Moving outside enjoy outdoor entertaining in the alfresco that spills out to the monstrous rear yard that would perfectly suit the family buyer with plenty of room for the kids to play, the trades-person that could erect a large work shed or buyers that require space for boats, caravans etc can utilise the possible side access, or for those that want it all installing a pool and creating your very own backyard oasis enjoying resort style living every day. Sleeping quarters comprise an extra oversized master bedroom with double vanity ensuite and 3 additional bedrooms of great size serviced by a lovely central bathroom. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, storage shed, landscaped gardens, double remote garage with internal access, double exposed aggregate driveway and walking distance to all the suburbs amenities. A very rare opportunity to enjoy a large modern home with a huge backyard so close to the city awaits one lucky purchaser. Description:
Elite Eight: Setting the Benchmark in Sophisticated and Stylish Living
Exceptional emphasis on modern design, contemporary style and family functionality; this stunning home will certainly impress as it boasts a highly coveted address, just minutes to the heart of Derrimut, great schools, transport and much more. A grand entrance opens up via luxury double doors into a wide hallway that leads off to a functioning home office. Follow the wide hall way past the downstairs 5th bedroom/formal lounge, second living area and you're swept into a large open plan space encompassing a spacious and relaxing family room with a fully equipped chef's style kitchen offering Caesarstone bench tops, 900mm upright stainless steel oven and glass splash back- all overlooking the meals area. Step out to the back and it's an entertainer's paradise. The backyard consists of alfresco decking leading out to a large, grassed back yard, perfect for the kids to play. Powder room/third bathroom, laundry and a storage room under the staircase, complete the downstairs living zones. The upstairs retreat services a kid's living zone and comprises
four large bedrooms all featuring built in robes, a central family bathroom and
a sprawling master bedroom accompanied by a walk through robe, your own balcony and a luxury en-suite with shower and double vanity.
Added extras include beautiful solid timber flooring
throughout most of the home , gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, intercom, alarm system, security cameras,
custom built electric front gate, double
garage with internal access, as well as side access leading back to another oversized double car garage for all your toys.
Avoid disappointment as a home with this much to offer, is rarely available.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED CONTACT AGENT
You have finally found it.
Beautifully presented and with great attention to detail, this lovely Burbank residence provides the perfect blend of indoor/outdoor living offering a contemporary and sophisticated interior complimented by a fantastic outdoor entertainment space that spills out into a low maintenance backyard. The home comprises of 3 spacious bedrooms, the master with WIR, 2 sensational bathrooms and an upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances that overlooks the expansive dining and living area. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, soaring high ceilings, study, floating timber floors in bedrooms, outdoor BBQ with sink , solar power, roller shutter, landscaped front and rear gardens, and double remote garage with rear access. This will not last long.

Description:
Generous in All Aspects.
What a stunning find this generous family home is, and with convenience too.Walk across the road to the Derrimut Primary School, and just minutes by car to the Western Freeway, Homes this good at this price are a rare find.
The home comprises of 4 large bedrooms, the master is located to the rear and has its own walk in robe and ensuite.The remaining 3 bedrooms all benefit from built in robes.This home has a family bathroom, separate toilet, a formal living are to the front, flowing through to the massive open plan living, meals and modern kitchen which benefits from plenty of workspace, cupboards, and dishwasher.
There is an alfresco flowing off the main, leading to the low maintenance garden with more than enough space to let the kids play.
The remote double garage also has a rear roller door for the trailer to fit through and convenience.
The home also benefits form ducted heating, and split system cooling, an inspection is essential to fully appreciate.
Call Jay on 0422 280 465.

Description:
The Great Starter!
Offering open plan living, this quality built home is ideal for the first home buyers & investors. Land size: 615 sqm approx.
* Comprising 4 spacious bedrooms all with BIR's, master bedroom features WIR & ensuite.
* Formal lounge room & dining room, open plan kitchen with quality appliances.
* Bright central bathroom & laundry, ducted heating, cooling.
* Double garage, low maintenance front & rear yards with enclosed alfresco.
* Within a close proximity to shops, schools & public transport.
